title: Junior Robotics
description: Learn the basics of robots through fun, hands-on activities.
Build simple bots using sensors and block-based coding.
Develop creativity, logic, and teamwork while having fun.

title: Intermediate Robotics
description: Dive into Arduino, Raspberry Pi, and real electronics.
Code robots using Python and C++ for smart control.
Work on exciting projects in AI, sensors, and automation.

title: Advanced Robotics
description: Master ROS, kinematics, and robotic motion control.
Learn transformations, simulations, and robot dynamics.
Build and deploy advanced robotic systems with AI.
